frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating related queries when the identity changes.

frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Returns whether a CSS media query matches, updating reactively on changes.

frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into abbreviated strings like 1.2k or 3M.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Validates and compresses images on the client, including resizing, format conversion, and animated GIF detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to strict alphanumeric lowercase format with error messages.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using the Web Share API with clipboard and manual fallback handling.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes tags to alphanumeric lowercase format with optional empty values.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, IDs, and Froggy Phrase recovery with localStorage, including hashing, backup, and restore functions.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements localStorage-based cooldown tracking to prevent frequent view count increments per lily post.
